channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- ThreadX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- ThreadX

item.title: CVE-2024-2214|2024-03-26T15:48:36.304Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- threadx
item.description: In Eclipse ThreadX before version 6.4.0, the _Mtxinit() function in the Xtensa port was missing an array size check causing a memory overwrite. The affected file was ports/xtensa/xcc/src/tx_clib_lock.c
